item.description:
We have been invited to Game On for their free 2012 Red Sox Kick Off Party on Friday, April 6, at 7:00 pm.

Expect complimentary appetizer buffet, great prizes, 20 pairs of red sox ticket give-aways to 20 games including Opening Day, Opening Weekend, and Yankess Games, free access to the Fenway Park batting cages,  surprises and more.

Expect a crowd. Arrive early or later but early is better.

Invite fans, friends and guests.

Over 30 people attended this last year.
item.how_to_find_us: We E Mailed Game On for a Reserved Table but have not heard back Ask the hostess.
item.name: 2012 Red Sox Kick Off Party at Game On with Free Batting Cage Access
